Welcome to the group Alex!
  Have you checked out this website: http://www.worlditc.org/h_07_meek_spiri_000_007.htm and:
   
   http://www.ghostpix.com/spiricom/spiricom.html
   
   
  They both have quite a bit of info on the Spiricom and the research done.
   
  Rhonda

alexrondini <alexrondini@...> wrote:
          Hi all,

I'm new on this group. Not too sure whether this topic was 
discussed already or not but I wanted to get your oppinion on the 
Spiricon device. Does anyone know more about it?

Alex
